kv14.7:1.1_0: forms of the form element, and the element of form element.
kv14.7:1.3_0: Furthermore, a curse of rebirth in the present life, with mind as they live, their mind inclines to blissful meditation in the present life. With a single guarding mind, they mix closely with one foot, and one part.
kv14.7:1.5_0: Don’t you undertake the precept to illness for a wise person who doesn’t get blissful meditation in the present life, mind, and lives having reached the goal of life as they don’t mix closely with one part.
kv14.7:1.7_0: There were no extra bowl in the present life. ...

kv14.7:4.3_0: Furthermore, a curse of rebirth in the present life, with mind as they live, their mind inclines to blissful meditation in the present life. With a single guarding mind, they mix closely with one foot, and one part.
kv14.7:4.5_0: Don’t undertake the predatory spirits, blissful meditation in the present life, nor mind, and remained in the present life. ...
kv14.7:4.9_0: “Having reached the formless realm, the realm of luminous form, and the formless realm.”
kv14.7:5.3_0: the sound of sounds, and the ear element ...
kv14.7:6.11_0: He should not speak harshly because of form;
kv14.7:6.12_0: “Having completely understood the elements of form?”
kv14.7:6.1_0: He should not speak sound element;
kv14.7:6.4_0: He should not speak harshly because of form;
kv14.7:7.1_0: should not correct them like this:
kv14.7:7.2_0: “Having form and formlessness in the form element of form, the formless element, and the formless element?”
kv14.7:7.4_0: Hasn’t sensual desire given up the elements of sensual pleasures, the element of the sensual realm.
kv14.7:7.6_0: The sensual element of the sensual desire given up the elements of sensual desire, the realm of the world, and the seven elements.
kv14.7:7.7_0: “Having stayed in form and formlessness there is formlessness, transcending form, and formlessness.”
kv14.7:7.8_0: The discussion of the Monastic Code is finished.
